Cockroach.name: Cockroach
Cockroach.description: A house pest common in urban area
Cockroach.author: Chia Inventory#9520

Mouse.name: Mouse
Mouse.description: A house pest common in urban area
Mouse.author: Chia Inventory#9520

Drunk Man.name: Drunk Man
Drunk Man.description: Drunk men can always be observed in the tavern
Drunk Man.author: Chia Inventory#9520

Thief.name: Thief
Thief.description: Thieves can always be observed in the market
Thief.author: Chia Inventory#9520

Scum.name: Scum
Scum.description: Scums can always be found in the city
Scum.author: Chia Inventory#9520

Guard.name: Guard
Guard.description: The guard is stationed here, he said: hunting is not permitted!
Guard.author: Chia Inventory#9520

Murloc Grunt.name: Murloc Grunt
Murloc Grunt.description: They are known for their odd sound mrglwglwlg, which translates to I kill you human stinker or I love you, translators still have problems understanding them, maybe because most of them died trying. Murlocs have fishlike skin, body consists of two legs and two arms. Don't be afraid, they are stupid warriors lurking in shallow water near lakes and shoreline.
Murloc Grunt.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Murloc Queen.name: Murloc Queen
Murloc Queen.description: Whenever you meet her, it means there are lots of murlocs around protecting their queen. She is known for trying to seduce everyone she meets in order to increase population of her army. Murloc King doesn't like that, so you better keep your hands off her. If she tries to seduce you, it is better for you to close eyes and sing lala for the next 3minutes, or not .. whichever you prefer ^^.
Murloc Queen.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Murloc King.name: Murloc King
Murloc King.description: He is always busy looking at his queen and making sure she isn't cheating. But even a king has to sleep from time to time, and each time he wakes up, population of murlocs somehow increases. He might not be the best husband but don't underestimate him, he is the strongest among murlocs, heavy crown on his head is enchanted and makes any murloc wearing it very strong .... hold your horses I said it is only for murlocs, so unless you are one forget about taking it. If you manage to kill him, there are plenty other murlocs to take his place, king is dead long live the king or mrglwglwlg as murlocs say.
Murloc King.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Skeleton Warrior.name: Skeleton Warrior
Skeleton Warrior.description: You take some body, preferably a dead one, add a sword and a shield, throw them in a grave. And years later ask some nice smiling necromancer to help you raise an army. They are not the fastets warrior around but boy they don't feel pain either.
Skeleton Warrior.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Skeleton Mage.name: Skeleton Mage
Skeleton Mage.description: They are basicly same as skeleton warriors with one but, they still have some brain leftover in their skulls making them smart enough to use some simple magic like fire. Their magic fireballs can really hurt, but they are weak enough to be killed quickly. Some necromancers use them as a lighter that is always there.
Skeleton Mage.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Zombie.name: Zombie
Zombie.description: Some necromancers are in a hurry and can't wait for flesh to rot, so instead of skeletons they make zombies. Zombies have some cons, they are slower, they make too much noise and they are too stiff to hold weapons so they only bite. On the pros side a zombie is sturdy as a tank, still plenty of hp left in those rotten corpses that just walk in search for ... BRAINS.
Zombie.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Undead slime.name: Undead slime
Undead slime.description: This is just a normal slime but soaked with dark magic, making it more ressistant to physical attacks. Remember to wash off the smell after defeating one of them, who knows where they have been.
Undead slime.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Ghost.name: Ghost
Ghost.description: They are mostly lost souls that can't find their way, wil you help them ... with your sword ? Oh and always make sure your weapon have some iron in it, you can also try to steal some salt from Tavern just in case you need protection from ghosts, but stealing in tavern might be worse than fighting a ghost. Anyway in case you are unarmed and you see a ghost, then who you gonna call ? Noone you marshmallow, there are no phones in this game, just run.
Ghost.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Bat.name: Bat
Bat.description: Creature of night, so untill you light your torch it will have all the advantage it needs. Some adventurers report that they lost blood and didn't even knew when. Most of bats lives in dark caves or very dark woods.
Bat.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Sleepy Bear.name: Sleepy Bear
Sleepy Bear.description: Why, oh why did someone have to wake it up ? Don't we already have full hands of fighting with everything around ? It is just a bear, an angry and strong one. Next time just let him sleep.
Sleepy Bear.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Hungry Wolf.name: Hungry Wolf
Hungry Wolf.description: Have you ever been so hungry that You would eat anything ? Even if the meal is wearing metal armor and has a sword ? If yes then you were a wolf in your previous life. They don't mind you being strong, they are hungry and forest is their playground, you are their cheewing toy on two legs.
Hungry Wolf.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Forest Thief.name: Forest Thief
Forest Thief.description: Everyone knows a guy that didn't give them their money back. He is hidding in shadows of dark woods, running away from people that are mad at him. Lucky for him noone is that stupid to look in dark woods, or is there someone ? Well meeting a forest thief might be last thing you do, with his backstab from shadows your life usually ends quickly.
Forest Thief.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Corrupted Living Tree.name: Corrupted Living Tree
Corrupted Living Tree.description: Grandparents usually tell their grandchildren stories of times past. Well this isn't this story, it involves a drunk necromancer that was cursed by heartbroken witch. He was so drunk that he had to take a piss, he did that near a tree. Seconds after his relief, tree became alive and pissed off by someone naked in front of it, killed the pure yet still drunk necromancer. Now corrupted tree is wandering the woods in search of a dry towel. Be careful of what you do in the woods.
Corrupted Living Tree.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Crazy Witch.name: Crazy Witch
Crazy Witch.description: Maybe you heard stories about a necromancer, who fell in love with a witch. Well he's the one. Long story short, he dumped her, she went mental and now everyone is calling her crazy. Ofcourse behind her back, noone is brave enough to face her in combat. Broken heart made her magic stronger.
Crazy Witch.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Poisonous Fungus.name: Poisonous Fungus
Poisonous Fungus.description: It looks like a normal fungus untill it tries to poison you. You die or hold breath long enough to kill it. End of story.
Poisonous Fungus.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Naga Warrior.name: Naga Warrior
Naga Warrior.description: Remember murlocs ? Now imagine a bigger stronger murloc without legs but with snakelike body, with scales instead of skin, with some brain instead of a peanut, that is naga. They are great warriors so watch out.
Naga Warrior.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Naga Caster.name: Naga Caster
Naga Caster.description: Fish and snake like creature that is often protected by their warriors counterparts. It can control element of water, I hope you can swim in case it tries to drown you in a magic water bubble.
Naga Caster.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Naga Queen.name: Naga Queen
Naga Queen.description: She is a hell of a singer. She knows how to motivate her soldiers, for other nagas sounds she makes are beautiful. For you dear adventurer they are terrible, like nails on a chalkboard.
Naga Queen.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Red Crab.name: Red Crab
Red Crab.description: It is a crab, it walks sideways. It can pinch you like you have never been pinched before. Oh and it is red ... or green, We are not sure, because our adventurer was a daltonist untill he died from eating wrong mushrooms.
Red Crab.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Pearl Clam.name: Pearl Clam
Pearl Clam.description: Every adventurer dreams about a treasure. Well here is it, inside a clam, and that clam is somewhere deep. Not very precise but we really don't know where exactly it is right now. Maybe there is more than one. All we know is that fighting with it is like hitting a wall, just watch out for splinters they are painfull.
Pearl Clam.author: Aquankh#0309 xch1htsukhsh2yrp5mqa344qya3xpqgenad9xcmfyaj3drl0hadgu80qw9q3yv

Scorpion.name: Scorpion
Scorpion.description: A oversized Scorpion. Living in the deserts of Harenae
Scorpion.author: Da8erRul85#2286 xch1fvk9fn4jlvpgsyy7sz0akyuqyvvefcltnhzmrkxkukzrckd3fdmq08lgy0

Rabid Hyena.name: Rabid Hyena
Rabid Hyena.description: A Rabid Hyena laughs madly at the adventurers. Living in the deserts of Harenae
Rabid Hyena.author: Da8erRul85#2286 xch1fvk9fn4jlvpgsyy7sz0akyuqyvvefcltnhzmrkxkukzrckd3fdmq08lgy0

Living Cactus.name: Living Cactus
Living Cactus.description: A haunted cactus came to life by imbalance of nature. Living in the deserts of Harenae
Living Cactus.author: Da8erRul85#2286 xch1fvk9fn4jlvpgsyy7sz0akyuqyvvefcltnhzmrkxkukzrckd3fdmq08lgy0

Fire Elemental.name: Fire Elemental
Fire Elemental.description: Elements of fire are out of control. This monster glides on a flame over the lands. It has two montrous arms and a head. Living in the deserts of Harenae and at hot and volcaneous places.
Fire Elemental.author: Da8erRul85#2286 xch1fvk9fn4jlvpgsyy7sz0akyuqyvvefcltnhzmrkxkukzrckd3fdmq08lgy0

Air Elemental.name: Air Elemental
Air Elemental.description: Elements of air are out of control. This monster glides on a tornado out of dust. Electric lighning flashes through the body of this monster. Unprepared adventurers will be zapped to death. Living in the deepest nature of Salvia Continent.
Air Elemental.author: Da8erRul85#2286 xch1fvk9fn4jlvpgsyy7sz0akyuqyvvefcltnhzmrkxkukzrckd3fdmq08lgy0

Water Elemental.name: Water Elemental
Water Elemental.description: Elements of water are out of control. This monster is a gigantic gliding water drop with ice crystals circling above it's head. Weak adventurers will be drowned or frozen
Water Elemental.author: Da8erRul85#2286 xch1fvk9fn4jlvpgsyy7sz0akyuqyvvefcltnhzmrkxkukzrckd3fdmq08lgy0

Griffin.name: Griffin
Griffin.description: A mythical creature with the head and wings of an eagle. Living in Mountain areas
Griffin.author: Da8erRul85#2286 xch1fvk9fn4jlvpgsyy7sz0akyuqyvvefcltnhzmrkxkukzrckd3fdmq08lgy0

Ice Wolf.name: Ice Wolf
Ice Wolf.description: A mystical wolf living in the cold ice of Glacies
Ice Wolf.author: Da8erRul85#2286 xch1fvk9fn4jlvpgsyy7sz0akyuqyvvefcltnhzmrkxkukzrckd3fdmq08lgy0

Yeti.name: Yeti
Yeti.description: A big yeti lifing in the cold ice of Glacies
Yeti.author: Da8erRul85#2286 xch1fvk9fn4jlvpgsyy7sz0akyuqyvvefcltnhzmrkxkukzrckd3fdmq08lgy0

Ice Crab.name: Ice Crab
Ice Crab.description: A ice crab living on icy shores
Ice Crab.author: Da8erRul85#2286 xch1fvk9fn4jlvpgsyy7sz0akyuqyvvefcltnhzmrkxkukzrckd3fdmq08lgy0

Mimic Chest.name: Mimic Chest
Mimic Chest.description: Looks like an ordinary treasure chest, but has teeth as sharp as a shark. Snaps unsuspecting adventurers. Lives at haunted places
Mimic Chest.author: Da8erRul85#2286 xch1fvk9fn4jlvpgsyy7sz0akyuqyvvefcltnhzmrkxkukzrckd3fdmq08lgy0

Mimic Book.name: Mimic Book
Mimic Book.description: Looks like an ordinary book, but spells magic against unsuspecting adventurers.
Mimic Book.author: Da8erRul85#2286 xch1fvk9fn4jlvpgsyy7sz0akyuqyvvefcltnhzmrkxkukzrckd3fdmq08lgy0

Goblin Child.name: Goblin Child
Goblin Child.description: The weak and small goblin child.
Goblin Child.author: Chia Inventory

Goblin Slave.name: Goblin Slave
Goblin Slave.description: This goblin slave seems a bit strong.
Goblin Slave.author: Chia Inventory

Goblin Farmer.name: Goblin Farmer
Goblin Farmer.description: This goblin farmer seems a bit strong.
Goblin Farmer.author: Chia Inventory

Goblin Warrior.name: Goblin Warrior
Goblin Warrior.description: An armed goblin warrior holding an axe.
Goblin Warrior.author: Chia Inventory

Goblin Archer.name: Goblin Archer
Goblin Archer.description: A thing and sneaky goblin archer.
Goblin Archer.author: Chia Inventory

Goblin Guard.name: Goblin Guard
Goblin Guard.description: A strong and fully armed goblin guard.
Goblin Guard.author: Chia Inventory

Goblin Captain.name: Goblin Captain
Goblin Captain.description: This red goblin is extremely strong.
Goblin Captain.author: Chia Inventory

A Wood Cage.name: A Wood Cage
loot: A Note Page of Blacksmith Apprentice
A Wood Cage.description: After you opened the cage, a humanoid creature quickly come out and run away!
